attributes.action: Equal wages for women is very important.Women do not get equal opprtunities and pay.
attributes.additional_details: Women do not get equal pay.women do not get equal opportunities.Reduce income inequality makes a fairer safer and happier society. At the moment women have been hit hard by coalition Govt.Vat has gone up.There is no more child trust fund also.In the aftermarth of the recent riots,we have to work hard to ensure that prospectives on the impact of income inequality are prominent in the debate,both to shed light on some of the causes and to provide positive ideas for preventing these scenes from being repeated.
